videoSnippet.title: Taming The Madras Tiger | Anand vs Hou Yifan | Grenke Chess Classic 2018.
videoSnippet.description:
#agadmator recommend you check out the official trailer for Round 1 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pJd8X7RMu0U&lc=z23dt1pofrj5ubzrb04t1aokgq1tabvsj0yj0acwjn1frk0h00410&feature=em-comments

Also, check out the interview with Hou Yifan https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fu7vfA-s5dM

Viswanathan Anand vs Yifan Hou
GRENKE Chess Classic (2018), Karlsruhe GER, rd 1, Mar-31 
English Opening: Anglo-Indian Defense. King's Knight Variation (A15)

1. Nf3 Nf6 2. c4 e6 3. Nc3 d5 4. e3 Bd6 5. b3 O-O 6. Bb2 c5 7. g4 d4 8. ed4 cd4 9. Nd4 e5 10. Nf5 Bf5 11. gf5 Nc6 12. Bg2 Nb4 13. Qe2 Nc2 14. Kd1 Na1 15. Ba1 Qd7 16. Ne4 Qf5 17. Nf6 Qf6 18. Bb7 Rad8 19. Kc2 Rfe8 20. Bc3 Bc5 21. f3 Bd4 22. Re1 g6 23. Qe4 Kg7 24. Bd5 Qb6 25. b4 f5 26. Qd3 Bc3 27. dc3 Qd6 28. a4 a5 29. Kb3 Rb8 30. b5 Qc5 31. h4 Rbd8 32. h5 Kf6 33. hg6 hg6 34. Qe3 Qe3 35. Re3 Rd6 36. Re1 Rc8 37. Rh1 Kg7 38. Kc2 g5 39. Rd1 Kf6 40. Kd3 Rb6 41. Rh1 Kg7 42. Rg1 Kf6 43. Ke3 Rd6 44. Rb1 Rb6 45. Ke2 Kg6 46. Kf2 Kf6 47. Rh1 Kg7 48. Re1

The 2018 GRENKE Chess Classic is a 10-player round-robin held in Germany from 31 March to 9 April. The first 3 rounds are in Karlsruhe alongside the GRENKE Chess Open, then after a rest day the last 6 rounds are in the Kulturhaus LA8 in Baden-Baden. The field features World Champion Magnus Carlsen and fellow Top 10 players Fabiano Caruana, Maxime Vachier-Lagrave, Vishy Anand and Levon Aronian, as well as women's no. 1 Hou Yifan.

The time control is 100 minutes for 40 moves, then 50 minutes for 20 moves and then 15 minutes to the end of the game, with a 30-second increment from move 1. If players are tied for first place a rapid play-off will take place. Official website: www.grenkechessclassic.com
